chapter-13_key4: Read-binary ('rb') for Pdf`File`Reader() and write-binary ('wb') for Pdf`File`Writer()
chapter-13_key5: Calling getPage(4) will return a Page object for About This Book, since page 0 is the first page.
chapter-13_key6: The numPages `variable` stores an `integer` of the number of pages in the Pdf`File`Reader object.
chapter-13_key8: The rotateClockwise() and rotateCounterClockwise() methods. The degrees to rotate is passed as an `integer` argument.
chapter-13_key10: A document contains multiple paragraphs. A paragraph begins on a new line and contains multiple runs. Runs are contiguous groups of characters within a paragraph.
chapter-13_key12: A Run object has these `variables` (not a Paragraph).
chapter-13_key13: `True` always makes the Run object bolded and `False` makes it always not bolded, no matter what the style’s bold setting is. None will make the Run object just use the style’s bold setting.
